snippet: The Day: Is there not an element of hypocrisy in the authorities' pursuit of people who are doing exactly what government itself wants to do, namely to run a gambling network?
abstract: The Day: Is there not an element of hypocrisy in the authorities' pursuit of people who are doing exactly what government itself wants to do, namely to run a gambling network?

headline.main: A Crackdown on Gambling, and a Push to Legalize It
